Form I – فعل (fa3ala) 
 Form II – فعّل (fa33ala)
 Form III – فاعل (faa3ala)
 Form IV – أفعل (af3ala) 
 Form V – تفعّل (tafa33ala) 
 Form VI – تفاعل (tafaa3ala) 
 Form VII – انفعل (infa3ala) 
 Form VIII – افتعل (ifta3ala) 
 Form IX – افعلّ (if3alla) 
 Form X – استفعل (istaf3ala)

This app has been put together to help students of the Arabic language. Instead of having to carry around a bulky dictionary, you can now access the same information at the luxury of your fingertips. If you\'ve benefited from this app then please share it with you friends, leave a review, consider donating to support development or like our Facebook page

Double letters:

th/v/V = "ث" \t gh/g/G = "غ" \t kh/x/X = "خ" \t sh/$ = "ش" \t dh = "ذ"

Different cases:

d = "د" \t t = "ت" \t D = "ض" \t T = "ط" \t z = "ز" \t h = "ه" \t Z = "ظ" \t H = "ح" \t s = "س" \t S = "ص"

All other "normal" letters:

a/A = "ا" \t q/Q = "ق" \t b/B = "ب" \t k/K = "ك" \t j/J = "ج" \t l/L = "ل" \t No.7 = "ح" \t m/M = "م" \t r/R = "ر" \t n/N = "ن" \t w/W = "و" \t y/Y = "ي" \t f/F = "ف" \t e/E/3 = "ع"

To search for a word please click on the search icon and enter the root letters of the word you would like to search for in Arabic or Roman Arabic. To navigate the dictionary, swipe left and right to turn pages. To zoom into the image pinch or double tap the screen and pan the image by swiping in the desired direction.
This app requires an internet connection to load the image files. Please connect to the internet for the image files to be loaded properly.
